UrlAction.Url: javascript:var site='{SiteUrl}';var list='{ListId}';var item='{ItemId}';var ItemUrl='{ItemUrl}';var view=ctx.view;var ret=window.open(site + '/_layouts/clifpages/ImportFromRepository.aspx?list='+ list + '&item=' + item,'printwindow','scollbars=1,resizable=1,height=650,width=600');
